last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 7
last_episode_to_air.overview: Alexander Armstrong presents a selection of some of the funniest moments from the first series of the impressions-based panel show, plus some outtakes and previously unseen footage.

name: The Imitation Game
overview: Rory Bremner and Debra Stephenson are joined by fellow impressionists Luke Kempner and Jess Robinson to perform a series of comedy challenges under the instruction of host and games-master Alexander Armstrong.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: This episode features a dazzling array of voices, some horribly miscast movies, some show-stopping musical impersonations and an hilarious attempt to date Christopher Biggins.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Joining Rory and Debra on the teams this week are Jon Culshaw and Christina Bianco. Julian Clary is the special guest. Lip reading Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are among this week's challenges.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Rory and Debra are joined by Jan Ravens and Anil Desai. We see a side to Prince Charles not seen before and The Terminator as re-imagined by primary school children.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Comedy panel show hosted by Alexander Armstrong. Team captains Debra Stephenson and Rory Bremner are joined by Kate Robbins and Luke Kempner. Kim Woodburn is today's special guest.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Alexander Armstrong, Debra Stephenson and Rory Bremner are joined by Jess Robinson and Lewis Macleod. This week we hear strange celebrity/animal hybrids, Theresa May singing and a retelling of a classic fairy tale.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Host Alexander Armstrong and team captains Rory Bremner and Debra Stephenson are joined by Alistair McGowan and link=nm0025852] and special guest William Hague.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Alexander Armstrong presents a selection of some of the funniest moments from the first series of the impressions-based panel show, plus some outtakes and previously unseen footage.
